dsDescriptionValue.value: Monthly data from 1981-2010 on the politics of seven vice issues: drugs, tobacco, alcohol, gambling, pornography, cocaine, and marijuana. In each month, New York Times coverage, congressional attention, and presidential attention to each issue is recorded. We also include a monthly measure of Stimson's policy Mood and indicator variables for the month in which Supreme Court decisions related to each issue were decided.

files.description: Monthly data from 1981 to 2010 of seven vice issues. Contains all information needed to run either uploaded R script, including press coverage, congressional attention, and presidential attention to each variable. Stimson's policy Mood and indicator variables for Supreme Court cases are also included.
files.label: comprehensive_data_8.10.16.xls

dataFile.description: Monthly data from 1981 to 2010 of seven vice issues. Contains all information needed to run either uploaded R script, including press coverage, congressional attention, and presidential attention to each variable. Stimson's policy Mood and indicator variables for Supreme Court cases are also included.
